required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Superficial Lesions in the Peri-auricular Region
clinical_study.official_title: The Superficial Lesions in the Peri-auricular Region; Retrospective Study

brief_summary.textblock: Superficial lesions on and around the ear are uncommon with many differential diagnoses and different characteristic histopathologic features. The purpose of this study was to describe a series of peri-auricular superficial lesions and characterize the distinctive types of these lesions.

detailed_description.textblock: Data included in this descriptive retrospective study were collected from records of 70 patients with superficial lesions around the auricle, i.e., periauricular (preauricular, auricular, and postauricular) during the period extending between 2017 and 2019, who were primarily diagnosed and operated. Data were retrieved, reviewed, and analyzed. The primary analysis outcome measures were patient history (age, gender, complaint, medical advice clinic, and associated medical diseases), lesions examination (site, laterality, clinical presentation, and the number of lesions). Also, the needed investigations for diagnosis, type of intervention, postoperative patient satisfaction were evaluated. Evaluation of the patients' follow up was done.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Data included in this descriptive retrospective study were collected from records of 70 patients with superficial lesions around the auricle, i.e., periauricular (preauricular, auricular, and postauricular) during the period extending between 2017 and 2019, who were primarily diagnosed and operated

primary_outcome.measure: clinical and Histopathlogical types of superficial lesion around the ear
primary_outcome.time_frame: Cases operated between in the previous 3 years from 2017 and 2019

clinical_study.condition: Superficial Cyst or Mass and Sinus on and Around the Ear

intervention.intervention_name: Complete excision to superficial lesions around the ear
intervention.description: Complete excision of these lesions and histopathology

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with superficial lesions around the auricle, i.e., periauricular (preauricular, auricular, and postauricular) operated during the period extending between 2017 and 2019
- Available full demographic, clinical and histopathological data
Exclusion Criteria:
- deep lesions involving parotid or parapharyngeal space
- Missed demographic, clinical and histopathological data

overall_official.affiliation: Nasr City, Eastern Avenue, University Street, Sohag, Egypt

responsible_party.investigator_title: Clinical Professor of Otolarygology head and neck surgery
